name: Rainbow Shaker
description: A colourful handmade shaker filled with rice — great sound, bright colours!
longDescription: The Rainbow Shaker is handmade by Isaac using recycled containers and filled with rice to give a crisp, satisfying shake sound. Each one is painted in bright colours and sealed tight so nothing falls out. Perfect for keeping rhythm in a band, playing along to songs, or just having fun making noise!
madeFrom: Recycled container, rice filling, non-toxic paint, sealed lid
goodFor: Keeping rhythm, school bands, singing along, musical fun

name: Rock Star Shaker
description: A bold black-and-red shaker with a rock star vibe. Sounds awesome!
longDescription: The Rock Star Shaker is the coolest shaker in the range. Painted in jet black with red lightning bolt details, it looks like something a real rock star would use. Filled with a mix of rice and small beads for a fuller, punchier shake sound. Handmade and hand-decorated by Isaac.
madeFrom: Recycled container, rice & bead filling, non-toxic paint, sealed lid
goodFor: Rock bands, percussion practice, school performances

name: Mini Shaker Set (3 Pack)
description: Three little shakers in different colours — perfect for sharing or classroom use.
longDescription: This set of three mini shakers is great for sharing with friends or using in a classroom. Each shaker is a different colour and makes a slightly different sound thanks to different fillings (rice, lentils, and small beads). They come as a set and are a brilliant gift for young musicians.
madeFrom: Recycled mini containers, mixed fillings, non-toxic paint
goodFor: Classroom music, gifts, group percussion, toddler-friendly

name: Thunder Stomp Box
description: A wooden stomp box that makes a deep thud — like a bass drum you play with your foot!
longDescription: The Thunder Stomp Box is a handmade wooden percussion box that you play by stomping your foot on it. It produces a deep, punchy thud that sounds like a kick drum. Great for acoustic jams, busking, or adding rhythm to any song. Built from solid wood with a rubber non-slip base. Decorated with Isaac's signature flame design.
madeFrom: Solid wood, rubber non-slip base, hand-painted design
goodFor: Acoustic bands, busking, solo performers, rhythm practice

name: Mega Stomp Box
description: The big one! Extra loud stomp box with deeper bass — for serious young rockers.
longDescription: The Mega Stomp Box is the deluxe version of our Thunder Stomp Box. It's bigger, louder, and has a deeper bass tone. Made from thicker wood with an internal sound chamber for maximum volume. Perfect for performing or recording. Each one is hand-decorated with a unique design by Isaac.
madeFrom: Thick solid wood, internal sound chamber, rubber base, hand-painted
goodFor: Performances, recording, band practice, serious percussion

name: Upcycled Custom Guitar
description: A second-hand guitar given new life with custom vinyl skins and decals. Coming soon!
longDescription: We take second-hand guitars and make them awesome again! Each upcycled guitar gets a full clean-up, new strings, and a custom vinyl skin or decal designed by Isaac. Every guitar is one-of-a-kind. This product is coming soon — sign up to be notified when the first ones are ready!
madeFrom: Second-hand guitar, new strings, custom vinyl skin/decals
goodFor: Beginner guitarists, collectors of unique instruments, gifts
